com.inmobi.androidsdk
Interface IMAdListener

public interface IMAdListener

The Listener interface for receiving notifications from IMAdView about the ad status.

Method Summary
 void onAdRequestCompleted(IMAdView adView)
          Called from InMobiAdView when this view has successfully loaded an ad.
 void onAdRequestFailed(IMAdView adView, IMAdRequest.ErrorCode errorCode)
          Called from IMAdView when this view has failed to load an ad.
 void onDismissAdScreen(IMAdView adView)
          Called from InMobiAdView when the ad comes back to its original position because of actions such as the user closing the expanded ad.
 void onShowAdScreen(IMAdView adView)
          Called from InMobiAdView when the ad expands on top of the screen because of some user action.
 

Method Detail

onAdRequestFailed

void onAdRequestFailed(IMAdView adView,
                       IMAdRequest.ErrorCode errorCode)
Called from IMAdView when this view has failed to load an ad.

Parameters:
adView - The IMAdView which has failed to load.
errorCode - The error code which specifies the reason for failing.

onAdRequestCompleted

void onAdRequestCompleted(IMAdView adView)
Called from InMobiAdView when this view has successfully loaded an ad.

Parameters:
adView - The IMAdView which has loaded an ad.

onShowAdScreen

void onShowAdScreen(IMAdView adView)
Called from InMobiAdView when the ad expands on top of the screen because of some user action. The application has to suspend itself on receiving this notification.

Parameters:
adView - The IMAdView which has loaded the ad.

onDismissAdScreen

void onDismissAdScreen(IMAdView adView)
Called from InMobiAdView when the ad comes back to its original position because of actions such as the user closing the expanded ad. The application has to resume itself on receiving this notification.

Parameters:
adView - The IMAdView which has loaded the ad.
